name: Myosotis (Concrete Buds)
description:
In a post apocalyptic world where plants have taken over, a Robot is collecting parts to make a friend in this desolate place.

History goes that robots had taken over and killed all humans in existence.  However, one lonely robot survived as they had shut down of sadness after their human friend was taken away. This caused the robot to eventually re-awaken and setting out to create a new friend.

Sadly the robot doesn't know they're about to create a monster in their innocence...

Credits:

Robot Model and its Animations: https://quaternius.itch.io/lowpoly-robot 

Background Music: Filaments by Scott Buckley: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=taAxpw03dgM

Comment: We are students and we created this game as a part of one of our assignments! We hope you enjoy! :D
